Pytket User Manual
==================

This manual refers to the following versions of pytket and extensions:

.. code-block:: text

    pytket == 0.14.0
    pytket-cirq == 0.15.0
    pytket-honeywell == 0.15.0
    pytket-projectq == 0.13.0
    pytket-pyquil == 0.15.0
    pytket-qiskit == 0.17.0
    pytket-qsharp == 0.16.0
    pytket-qulacs == 0.11.0

.. toctree::
    :maxdepth: 2

    manual_intro.rst
    manual_circuit.rst
    manual_backend.rst
    manual_compiler.rst
    manual_noise.rst

==================
